director.name: 克里斯蒂娜·佩林西奥利 Cristina Perincioli

introduction: 同工同酬！西柏林一家超级市场的四名女员工在工作和家庭中都感受到了巨大的压力，她们继续罢工，要求得到和男同事一样的薪水。乐队Ton Steine Scherben唱道：“如果你改变一切，一切都会改变/但只要你一个人，你就不能赢！“有了一个演员阵容，这部电影满足了它所宣扬的团结的要求——”这部电影是由女售货员和家庭主妇制作的。他们想出了这个故事，自己动手。电影系的学生帮助了他们。Equal pay for equal work! Four female employees at a West Berlin supermarket, who feel heavy pressure both at work and at home, go on strike to demand the same salary that their male colleague gets. The band Ton Steine Scherben sings along that “Everything changes if you change it / But you can't win as long as you're alone!” With a lay cast, the film fulfils the demand for solidarity that it preaches – “this film was made by saleswomen and housewives. They came up with the story and acted themselves. The film students helped them”.
